text: Marta Cartabia (born 14 May 1963) is an Italian jurist and academic who was the Minister of Justice in the government of Prime Minister Mario Draghi from 2021 to 2022. Cartabia was a Judge of the Constitutional Court of Italy between 2011 and 2020, Vice President from 12 November 2014 to 11 December 2019 and President from 11 December 2019 to 13 September 2020. Cartabia was one of the candidates nominated by members of the Italian Parliament for President of Italy in the 2022 elections. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Italian judges Category:Politicians from Lombardy
title: Marta Cartabia
